abstract.text: METHODS 3 4 High throughput screening: Huh-7 cells were seeded into 96-well plate (2000 5 cells/well) and infected with 5 MOI of DENV-2. One hour post-infection (h pi) cells 6 were washed twice with PBS and further cultured in DMEM with 2% FBS 7 containing DMSO (vehicle control) or 10 µM inhibitors from LOPAC 1280 (Sigma-8 Aldrich). 24 h pi cells were placed on ice and washed twice with ice-cold PBS 9

and fixed with ice-cold methanol at -20° C for 30 min. Cells were washed twice 10 with PBS followed by blocking and washing with PBS containing 0.2% BSA and 11 stained with DENV-E primary antibody (4G2-Merck Millipore) for one hour 12 followed by donkey anti-mouse Alexa-488 secondary antibody (Thermo 13

body_text.text: procured from American Type Culture Collection (ATCC-VR-26). Human 25 rotavirus (Wa strain) and MA-104 cells were a kind gift from Dr. Gagandeep 26

Kang. Rotavirus stock preparation and infection of Caco-2 cells (MOI of 0.5 27 pfu/cell) was performed as described previously except that serum free medium 28 was used at all stages (1). For determination of viral titers, infected culture 29 supernatants were activated by trypsin as described above, added on MA-104 30 cells were determined and continued incubation for one hour at 37° C. Virus 31 inoculum was removed and overlay medium (MEM with 0.8% tracaganth and 0.5 32 µg/ml trypsin) was added. 3 days post-infection, overlay medium was removed 33 and cells were fixed and stained as per the protocol followed for DENV. 34

For RSV stock preparation, HEp-2 cells (ATCC) were infected with an MOI 35 of 0.1 pfu/cell for one hour in MEM containing 2% FBS. Cells were washed once 36 with PBS, cultured in MEM-2% FBS and observed everyday for cytopathic effect 37 and syncytial formation (3-4 days). Cells were scraped in 3-4 ml of culture 38 medium and centrifuged at 1000 x g for 10 min at 4°C. Cell pellet was 39 resuspended in 1 ml of MEM-2%FBS and passed through a 26G syringe 40 attached to a one ml needle 10 times and centrifuged at 1000 x g for 10 min at 41 4°C. Multiple aliquots of the supernatant were prepared and stored at -80°C as 42 stock virus. RSV titers were estimated by plaque assays on HEp-2 cells by 43 following the same procedure as for DENV. Cells were washed with PBS twice and permeabilized using IMF buffer (2) 53 overnight at 4° C. Cells were stained with mouse anti-RSV antibody (AbD 54 Serotec) diluted in IMF buffer for 1 hour at 4° C followed by donkey-anti-mouse 55 antibody conjugated with alexaflour-488 (Invitrogen) for 1 hour at 4° C. 56
Appropriate unstained and secondary only controls were also processed in 57 parallel. Cells were washed and acquired in BD FACS Canto-II and data was 58

BIBREF0.title: Caco-2 cells were infected with 0.5 MOI of rotavirus and treated with DMSO or 20 μM of inhibitors. Viral titers from the supernatants was estimated by plaque assays at 18 h pi. Error bars represent geometric mean with 95%CI

FIGREF0.text: 24 h pi by trypsinizaton. Cells were washed once to remove any 48 traces of media and resuspended in 100 µl FACS buffer (0.25% FBS in 1X PBS) 49 and stained with 1:1000 dilution of fixable viability stain-EF 780 (Becton 50 Dickinson) for 15 minutes on ice. Cells were washed with FACS buffer and PBS 51 once each and fixed in ice-cold methanol and incubated at -20° C for 20 minutes.

FIGREF2.text: Assay: The cytotoxicity of the inhibitors was measured using 61 CytoTox 96® Non-Radioactive Cytotoxicity Assay Kit (Promega G1780). Huh-7 62 cells were plated at a density of 30,000 cells/well in a 48-well plate. Next day, 63 media containing 4-5 µM inhibitors were added and incubation continued for 24 64 hours. Untreated cells were lysed in lysis buffer provided in the kit and 65 centrifuged to collect supernatant (positive control for 100% lysis). Amount of 66 LDH release from all supernatants was measured as per the manufacturer's 67 protocol. 68 1. O' Mahony J, O' Donoghue M, Morgan JG, Hill C. 2000. Rotavirus 71 survival and stability in foods as determined by an optimised plaque assay 72 procedure. International Journal of Food Microbiology 61:177-185. 73 2. Haridas V, Rajgokul KS, Sadanandan S, Agrawal T, Sharvani V, 74 Gopalakrishna MV, Bijesh MB, Kumawat KL, Basu A, Medigeshi GR. 75 2013. Bispidine-amino acid conjugates act as a novel scaffold for the 76 design of antivirals that block Japanese encephalitis virus replication. Primary validation of inhibitors of DENV infection from LOPAC 1280 82 screening: (a) Huh-7 cells were infected with 3 MOI of DENV-2 and treated with 83 DMSO (vehicle control) or 10 µM inhibitors from the primary screen. Viral titers in 84 the supernatant was estimated by plaque assay at 24 h pi and (b) total RNA was 85 isolated from the cells to estimate DENV RNA levels by qRT-PCR. β-actin 86 transcript levels were used for normalization. Dotted line indicates the 90% 87 inhibition level. N-Desmethylclozapine, Fluoxetine hydrochloride and Salmeterol 88 xinafoate treated samples are circled. (c) Cytotoxicity assays were performed in 89 culture supernatants of cells treated with N-Desmethylclozapine, Fluoxetine 90 Desmethylclozapine, Fluoxetine hydrochloride and Salmeterol xinafoate 96 respectively. Viral titers from the supernatants was estimated by plaque assays 97 at 24 h pi. Error bars represent geometric mean with 95%CI. 98 99 FIG S3. Dengue inhibitors do not affect RSV infection: A549 cells were mock-100 infected (a) or infected with 1 MOI of RSV and treated with DMSO (b), 10 µM N-101 Desmethylclozapine (NDC) (c), Fluoxetine hydrochloride (d) and Salmeterol 102 xinafoate (e) inhibitors. RSV infection was monitored by FACS using RSV-F 103 antibody. RSV positive cell population is gated. (f) Virus positive cells (%) from 104 two independent experiment is presented. (g) Total RNA was isolated from RSV 105 infected, inhibitor-treated cells and the amount of RSV genome was estimated by 106 qRT-PCR. Error bars represent mean with SD. 107 108 FIG S4. Dengue inhibitors do not affect rotavirus infection: Caco-2 cells were 109 infected with 0.5 MOI of rotavirus and treated with DMSO or 20 µM inhibitors 110inhibitors. Viral titers from the supernatants was estimated by plaque assays at 111 18 h pi. Error bars represent geometric mean with 95%CI.

FIGREF3.text: h y l c l o p a z i n e F l u o x e t i n e S a l m e t e r Primary validation of inhibitors of DENV infection from LOPAC1280 screening: (a) Huh-7 cells were infected with 3 MOI of DENV-2 and treated with DMSO (vehicle control) or 10 μM inhibitors from the primary screen. Viral titers in the supernatant was estimated by plaque assay at 24 h pi and (b) total RNA was isolated from the cells to estimate DENV RNA levels by qRT-PCR. β-actin transcript levels were used for normalization. Dotted line indicates the 90% inhibition level. N-Desmethylclozapine, Fluoxetine hydrochloride and Salmeterol xinafoate treated samples are circled. (c) Cytotoxicity assays were performed in culture supernatants of cells treated with N-Desmethylclozapine, Fluoxetine hydrochloride and Salmeterol xinafoate for 24 h. Error bars represent mean with SEM. Effect of inhibitors on JEV and WNV infection. Huh-7 cells were infected with 3 MOI of JEV (a) or WNV (b) and treated with DMSO or 5 μM each of N-Desmethylclozapine, Fluoxetine hydrochloride and Salmeterol xinafoate respectively. Dengue inhibitors do not affect RSV infection: A549 cells were mock-infected (a) or infected with 1 MOI of RSV and treated with DMSO (b), 10 μM N-Desmethylclozapine (NDC) (c), Fluoxetine hydrochloride (d) and Salmeterol xinafoate (e) inhibitors. RSV infection was monitored by FACS using RSV-F antibody. RSV-positive cell population is gated. (f) Virus positive cells (%) from two independent experiment is presented. (g) Total RNA was isolated from RSV-infected, inhibitor-treated cells and the amount of RSV genome was estimated by qRT-PCR. Error bars represent mean with SD.

FIGREF4.text: Effect of inhibitors on DENV2 infection in C6/36 cells. C6/36 cells were infected with 3 MOI DENV and treated with DMSO or 5 μM inhibitors. Viral titers in the supernatant was estimated by plaque assay at 24 h pi. Error bars represent geometric mean with 95%CI.
